title: Android in Action, Second Edition
author: W. Frank Ableson
description: A comprehensive tutorial for Android developers covering architectural concepts and implementation strategies.

title: Specification by Example
author: Gojko Adzic
description: Focuses on software engineering and provides insights into creating software specifications through practical examples and techniques.

title: Flex 3 in Action
author: Tariq Ahmed
description: A hands-on tutorial for creating high-quality, interactive Rich Internet Applications (RIAs) using Flex 3.

title: Flex 4 in Action
author: Tariq Ahmed
description: Introduces Flex 4 and guides you through building dynamic and visually appealing Rich Internet Applications (RIAs).

title: Collective Intelligence in Action
author: Satnam Alag
description: A practical guide to implementing collective-intelligence concepts using Java, emphasizing data gathering and mining techniques, personalization, and collaboration.

title: Zend Framework in Action
author: Rob Allen
description: A comprehensive tutorial on using the Zend Framework to create web-based applications and web services.

title: Flex on Java
author: Bernerd Allmon
description: Teaches you how to integrate Flex with Java to create rich web applications.

title: Griffon in Action
author: Andres Almiray
description: A tutorial for Java developers exploring Griffon's high productivity approach to building Swing applications.

title: OSGi in Depth
author: Alexandre de Castro Alves
description: Delves into building application frameworks using the OSGi service platform, covering programming models, modularization techniques, and the development of domain-specific applications.
